summary: A new village at the Western Watchtower. New NPCs, Merchants, an Inn and a player house. All completely navmeshed and follower friendly.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/s8comoY.jpg[/img]

* All constructive criticism will be gladly welcome! Please suscribe, rate and comment if you like it!
** This mod does not conflit with Mirmulnir's attack during the main quest. Villagers will not intervene (Guards still do).
*** This mod should not conflict with any other mods other than ones that would modify the Western Watchtower.

A cozy little village at the Western Watchtower, which adds an Inn, a Player's House (meant for early game, not a mansion!), Merchants and Villagers as well as crafting equipment. All completely navmeshed and follower friendly.

The village does not conflict with dragon attacks (Mirmulnir or others). It reduces the battlefield around the watch tower, but gives strategic positioning to both the player AND the dragons.

Please, rate and comment!

-----------------------------------------

V3.0 Changes (Feb. 8) :

- Improvements of the Drachenhaus interior. More custom design and clutter.
- Improvement of Navmesh for the general area. Mainly Venna's house and the Drachenhaus.
- Fixed a merchant who would not go to work. Now, Aswad will be at his market stall during daytime and return home after a hard day of labour.

V2.0 Changes:

- Deleted Doomnick and Simon Gouletssen.
- Reduced the AI packages and NPC movement in the Hamlet (it made it too heavy on the framerate)

- Modified the inside of Venna's House. (Added more details. Aswad (the Hunter gear vendor) also lives there now.
- More detailed interior for the player house.
- Better Navmesh for a better AI pathfinding.
- Better lighting (less flickering).
- Modified Holindil to go from beggar to drunk in the Inn.

Installation:

Simply extract the file in your data folder, and activate the plugin in your launcher.

Uninstallation:

If you have any items stored in the Drachenhaus, do not forget to remove them! Other than that, simply make sure your character is in a different area before deactivating and deleting the plugin.

Compatibility Issues:

Any mod that modifies the Western Watchtower area.

There should not be any issues with mods influencing AI packages (per example: Wet and Cold - Holiday) but I'm not sure my mod will be affected.

******************************************************************************************************************************
***************** "Spoilers" **********************************************************************************************

Known "issues": Hjongar is a tough A-Hole. I know, I made him like that. He's easy to kite back to the guards tho.

If Hjongar doesn't spawn, just walk around the Whiterun plains in the area near the watchtower. He's bound to attack you at any given moment, given that he's "looking for you"... or you're bound to find his corpse laying somewhere because he took on a regiment.
author: Dhomnick
